column2: "Na ɔtsee Laban ne mbabanyin nsɛm a wɔkae
column3: dɛ
column4: Jakob afa dza ɔyɛ hɛn egya dze nyinara; na dza ɔyɛ hɛn egya dze na ɔdze enya egyapadze yi nyinara."

column2: "Na Jakob hwɛɛ Laban no ntɔn mu
column3: na hwɛ
column4: ɔnntse dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ nkan no ɔtse wɔ no do no."

column3: San kɔ w'egyanom asaase do
column4: na w'ebusua mu; na mibedzi w'ekyir."

column2: "Na Jakob somae na wɔkɛfrɛɛ Rahel nye Leah ma wɔbaa hamu wɔ no nguan no nkyɛn
column4: "na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: Muhu hom egya no ntɔn dɛ ɔnntse me dɛ nkan no; na m'egya ne Nyankopɔn na oedzi m'ekyir."

column2: "Na homara nyim dɛ m'ahoɔdzen nyinara na medze asom hom egya."

column3: na ɔasakyer m'akatua mpɛn du; na Nyankopɔn na ɔamma no kwan ma ɔannyɛ me bɔn."
Hɔn a hɔn ho yɛ woranworan no na ɔnyɛ w'akatua a
column4: ɔno nguan no nyinara wowo woranworan: na sɛ ɔse dɛ
column5: Hɔn a hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee na ɔnyɛ w'akatua a
column6: ɔno nguan no nyinara wowo nsensanee nsensanee."

column2: "Dɛm na Nyankopɔn agye hom egya no mbowa
column3: na ɔdze hɔn ama me."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a nguan no nyinsenyinsenii no
column3: nna memaa m'enyiwa do
column4: na muhun no wɔ adaaso mu
column7: mpɔnkyenyin a wɔfow nguan no nyinara hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe see me wɔ adaaso mu dɛ
column3: Jakob: na mesee dɛ
column4: Emi nye yi."

column3: Afei ma w'enyiwa do
column4: na hwɛ
column5: mpɔnkyenyin a wɔfow mpɔnkyeber no nyinara hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee
column7: nye ntokowa ntokowa: na mehu dza Laban reyɛ wo nyinara."

column3: beebi mbrɛ eseraa idum ho no a
column4: beebi mbrɛ ebɔɔ me anohoba no a; afei soɛr
column6: na san kɔ w'awobea asaase do."

column2: "Na Rahel nye Leah buae na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ana kyɛpɛn anaa egyapadze biara da ho wɔ hɔ ma hɛn wɔ hɛn egya fie a?"

column2: "Ana ommbuu hɛn ahɔho bi a? Osiandɛ ɔatɔn hɛn
column3: na eso oedzi hɛn tsisika ewie."

column2: "Osiandɛ ahonyadze a Nyankopɔn agye no hɛn egya hɔ nyinara hɛn nye hɛn mba dze a: na afei
column3: dza Nyankopɔn aka akyerɛ wo no nyinara
column4: yɛ."

column3: na ɔfaa ne mba nye ne yernom tsenatsenaa efumpɔnkɔ do;"
nye n'ahodze a onyae wɔ Paddan-aram no nyinara na
column4: osii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ n'egya Isaak nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do."

column2: "Nna Laban kɔ rukotwitwa no nguan ho nhwi: na Rahel wiaa n'egya no suman."
"Na Jakob wiaa noho guanee; osiandɛ ɔannka annkyerɛ Laban
column3: Sirianyi no."

column2: "Na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara guanee; na ɔsoɛree
column3: na otwaa Esutsen no
column4: na ɔmaa n'enyi kɔr Gilead bepɔw do."

column2: "Na ne ndaansa no wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Laban dɛ Jakob eguan."

column3: na otsiiw no nda esuon kwan; na ɔbɔtoo no Gilead bepɔw do."
Sirianyi no hɔ wɔ anafua adaaso mu
column4: na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Hwɛ woho yie amma aannkasa papa anaa bɔn annkyerɛ Jakob."

column2: "Na Laban too Jakob. Nna Jakob abɔ n'asesee wɔ bepɔw no do: na Laban ɔnye no nkorɔfo so bobɔɔ hɔndze wɔ Gilead bepɔw do."

column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi
column4: na ewia woho eguan me
column5: na asoa me mbabaa dze hɔn rokɔ dɛ hɔn a wɔdze mfowa afa hɔn ndɔmmum yi?"

column3: na iwiaa woho fii me nkyɛn; na annka annkyerɛ me
column4: ma maammfa enyigye na ndwom
column5: mpintsin na ɔnye nsanku menngya wo kwan;"

column2: "na amma maammfew me mbabanyin nye me mbabaa hɔn ano? Afei dze ayɛ nkwaseadze."
"Mowɔ tum dɛ nkyɛ menye wo dzi no bɔn: na ndeda anafua w'egya ne Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ
column3: Hwɛ woho yie
column4: mma aannkasa papa anaa bɔn annkyerɛ Jakob."

column2: "Na afei kaansa afe w'egya fie dodoodow ma ehia dɛ ekɔ mpo a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ewia mo suman yi?"

column2: "Na Jakob buae na ɔsee Laban dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ musuroi: na mesee dɛ
column4: ɔbɛyɛ na eregye wo mbabaa wɔ me nsamu enyimpi do."

column2: "Nyimpa biara a ibohu wo suman wɔ no hɔ no
column3: onyii no ɔnnkɛtsena ase: hɛn nuanom hɔn enyim ha yi ara hwehwɛ dza ɔyɛ wodze wɔ me nkyɛn
column4: na fa w'adze. Nna Jakob nnyim dɛ Rahel na oewia."

column4: na oennhu suman no."

column3: na ɔnye Laban hamee: na Jakob buae see Laban dɛ
column4: Mo mfom nye mmuana? Mo bɔn nye mmuana
column5: ma etsiw me ɔhyew do dɛm yi?"

column2: "Matsena wo nkyɛn mfe eduonu nye yi; wo nguamber nye wo mpɔnkyeber ammpon mba da
column3: na wo nguan mu nguannyin so

column2: "Mbrɛ meyɛe nye yi; adzekyee a nna ewia rehyew me
column3: adzesaa a nna awɔw resar me; na m'enyi so kokwae."

column2: "Mfe eduonu nye yi na matsena wo fie; wo mbabaa beenu ntsi mosoom wo mfe duanan
column3: na wo mbowakuw so ntsi mfe esia: na asakyer m'akatua mpɛn du."

Hom mboaboa abo ano; na wɔtasee abo
column4: na wɔhɔɔr no isiw: na wodzidzii siw no ho hɔ."

column2: "Na Laban frɛɛ no Jegar-sahaduta: na Jakob dze ɔfrɛɛ no Galeed."

sɛ Yɛpaapaa mu a
